Scry 3.
Name a card, then reveal the top card of your library. If you revealed the named card, you may play it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, draw a card.
You gain an emblem with “Play with the top card of your library revealed” and “You may play the top card of your library.”

[-3]: [i][/i]

cards.rules_text:
Discard a card, then sacrifice a creature. If you don't, remove two loyalty counters from Xal'il, Suitor of Death.

Each opponent sacrifices each creature he or she controls.

cards.rules_text:
Each instant and sorcery card not named Honor the Lost in your graveyard gains memorial until end of turn. The memorial cost is equal to its mana cost. If Honor the Lost was cast for its memorial cost, the memorial cost is {0} instead.

Flash
Ilin, Wayward Spirit can't be countered.

Cast Karn, God of Impurity only if your ancestry in black or your ancestry in colorless is five or greater.

Cast Sarkhan, God of Cataclysm only if your ancestry in red or your ancestry in green is five or greater.[i]
